lockup.toolTip: Lock-up options determine where the Netflix Logo, CTA, and Tune-in appear.

animation.toolTip: Animation options determine how the ad resolves to endframe.

input.toolTip:
Background image:
  • Match dimensions of the Container
  • Do not include brand elements (Title, Logo, CTA, Tune-In)

Title Treatment image:
  • Match dimensions of the Container
  • Use a transparent PNG
Enabling Supercut will play FPO video until a Monet Video Asset has been added to the Treatment.
Temporary supercut URL. Actual supercut will be uploaded in setting up treatment in Monet. Please upload only .mp4 videos under 1 MB.
